CustomField.formula: AND ( ( Apttus_Proposal__Product__r.Name = 'eParcel'|| Apttus_Proposal__Product__r.Name = "eParcel Express"), (APT_Product_Name__c = "Missing Manifest Fee" || APT_Product_Name__c = "Administrative Fee" || APT_Product_Name__c = "Return to Sender" || APT_Product_Name__c = "Minimum Collection Value"))
CustomField.label: Charge Type Checked
